# twoPoleTwoZeroFilter(_:coefficients:result:)

**Type Method**

Performs single-precision, two-pole, two-zero recursive filtering.

## Declaration

```swift
static func twoPoleTwoZeroFilter<U, V>(_ source: U, coefficients: (Float, Float, Float, Float, Float), result: inout V) where U : AccelerateBuffer, V : AccelerateMutableBuffer, U.Element == Float, V.Element == Float
```

## Vector-to-Vector Recursive Filtering on Real Vectors

- **twoPoleTwoZeroFilter(_:coefficients:)**: Returns the result of double-precision, two-pole, two-zero recursive filtering.
- **twoPoleTwoZeroFilter(_:coefficients:)**: Returns the result of single-precision, two-pole, two-zero recursive filtering.
- **twoPoleTwoZeroFilter(_:coefficients:result:)**: Performs double-precision, two-pole, two-zero recursive filtering.
